catentdesc.name: Fast Financing
catentdesc.shortdescription: Get an inside look on the personal finance industry.
catentdesc.longdescription: Fast Financing provides an inside look on the personal finance industry, including up and coming growth sectors for your capital. Find investing tips, best practices for investment, and retirement planning tips in Fast Financing.

catentdesc.name: Investing Interests
catentdesc.longdescription: Maximizing the power of statistics to earn you money, Investing Interests brings you the latest financial trends before the rest of the market finds out. Find articles on ethical investing, environmental investment opportunities, and money management tips that fit your lifestyle.

catentdesc.name: Modern Finance
catentdesc.shortdescription: A fresh perspective on modern investing.
catentdesc.longdescription: Fresh voices and perspectives on maximizing investments in a digital world speak directly to you. Find articles on custom investment demographics and ways to make your money work smarter for you, so that you don't have to.

catentdesc.name: Money Management
catentdesc.shortdescription: Get back on track to financial independence.
catentdesc.longdescription: Money Management has been the authority on personal finance since 1957. Offering unrivaled insight into business and economic news while providing the background information that successful investors crave, Money Management is the only financial magazine you'll ever need.

catentdesc.name: Smart Investing
catentdesc.shortdescription: The only financial analysis you need.
catentdesc.longdescription: Over 3.2 million readers take advantage of the insight and financial advice Smart Investing provides every year. Showcasing market trends and emerging opportunities as well as tried and true investment principles of the most successful businesses in America.
